sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz enthralled a room full of potential Westmoreland County voters Wednesday as he works to make his mark in a crowded field of candidates vying to represent Pennsylvania in the U.S. Senate.
author: Megan Tomasic
title: Dr. Mehmet Oz stumps in Westmoreland County in quest for U.S. Senate
Letter to the editor: Words give wrong impression of Dr. Oz event

sentence: Maybe this doesn’t seem like a big deal when talk show host Dr. Mehmet Oz, a longtime New Jersey resident, is running for Pennsylvania’s U.S. Senate seat after changing his address to his in-laws’ Philly-area home, per the Philadelphia Inquirer, but it does matter.
title: Editorial: Constables have to follow law to enforce it
